post.summary: Create a Box Doc Gen template
post.description: Marks a file as a Box Doc Gen template.

requestBody.description: Marks the provided file as a Box Doc Gen template.

201.description: The file which has now been marked as a Box Doc Gen template.

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content or resource requested.

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

default.description: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

get.description: Lists Box Doc Gen templates on which the user is a collaborator.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

401.description:
Returned when the access token provided in the `Authorization` header
is not recognized or not provided.

delete.description: Unmarks file as Box Doc Gen template

parameters.name: template_id
parameters.description: ID of the file which will no longer be marked as a Box Doc Gen template.

204.description: Returns an empty response when a file is no longer marked as a Box Doc Gen template.

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content or resource requested.

404.description:
Returned if the template is not found or the user does not
have access to the associated template.

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

default.description: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

get.summary: Get Box Doc Gen template by ID
get.description: Lists details of a specific Box Doc Gen template.

parameters.name: template_id
parameters.description: The ID of a Box Doc Gen template.

401.description:
Returned when the access token provided in the `Authorization` header
is not recognized or not provided.

404.description:
Returned if the template is not found or the user does not
have access to the associated template.

get.summary: List all Box Doc Gen template tags in template
get.description: Lists all tags in a Box Doc Gen template.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

200.description: A list of document generation template tags.

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content or resource requested.

404.description: The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future.

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

default.description: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

get.summary: Get Box Doc Gen job by ID
get.description: Get details of the Box Doc Gen job.

200.description: Details of the Box Doc Gen job.

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content or resource requested.

404.description:
Returned if the job is not found or the user does not
have access to the associated job.

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

default.description: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

get.summary: List all Box Doc Gen jobs
get.description: Lists all Box Doc Gen jobs for a user.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

200.description: A list of Box Doc Gen jobs.

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content or resource requested.

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

default.description: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

get.summary: Get list of all Box Doc Gen jobs for template
get.description: Lists the users jobs which use this template.

parameters.name: template_id
parameters.description: Id of template to fetch jobs for.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

200.description: A single Box Doc Gen template.

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content or resource requested.

404.description:
Returned if the template is not found or the user does not
have access to the associated template.

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

default.description: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

get.summary: Get Box Doc Gen jobs in a batch with a specific ID
get.description: Lists Box Doc Gen jobs in a batch

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

200.description: Returns a list of Box Doc Gen jobs in a Box Doc Gen batch.

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content or resource requested.

404.description:
Returned if the batch is not found or the user does not
have access to the associated batch.

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

default.description: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

post.summary: Generate document using a Box Doc Gen template
post.description: Generates a document using a Box Doc Gen template.

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content or resource requested.

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

default.description: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

status.description: The HTTP status of the response.

message.description: A short message describing the error.

context_info.description:
A free-form object that contains additional context
about the error. The possible fields are defined on
a per-endpoint basis. `message` is only one example.

help_url.description: A URL that links to more information about why this error occurred.

request_id.description:
A unique identifier for this response, which can be used
when contacting Box support.

DocGenBatch--Base.description: The basic representation of a Box Doc Gen batch object. A Box Doc Gen batch contains one or more Box Doc Gen jobs.

allOf.description: Destination folder for the generated files.
